name: Syrinscape Online Player

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Syrinscape Online Player/Syrinscape Online Player.exe

content:
files:
- installer: 'N/A: Select Installer'
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Syrinscape Online Player/Syrinscape Online Player.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Syrinscape Online Player.
    executable: $installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
